wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Gilchrist (born 29 December 1895) was a Scottish footballer who played for Third Lanark, Heart of Midlothian, Rangers (two spells, though no appearances in the second having signed up for military service in World War I), Kilmarnock, Motherwell, Dumbarton, King's Park, Bo'ness and Clackmannan, mainly as an inside right.
